it.polimi.se2018.network.messages.requests

Class ToolCardMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.network.messages.requests.Message
      • it.polimi.se2018.network.messages.requests.ToolCardMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ToolCardMessage
extends Message
    This class represents a message from a player wishing to specify the inputs needed to use the Tool Card in his hand
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
